title: About The Pool Party and April Fools Skins
body: Since Riot has expanded skins, and now they all happen in separate universes or alternate time lines/dimensions, would it be safe to assume that the Pool Party skins and the Aprils Fools skins take place in the original League universe, where the League and summoners still exist?

replies.body:
The Pool Party universe is its own thing. 

Where everyone likes to party.

Also there is a pool.


The universe closest to what you're looking for is the Warden/Marauder universe, which is in homage to the two original factions, the Magelords and the Protectorate.

Now hold on hold on.

PLEASE tell me were getting some follow up to the Marauders and Wardens because that is one HELL of a bomb you just dropped on me

We're figuring out story beats for the skinline next week. So at least some color text should roll out within the next patch or three (fingers crossed).

I have no idea about future installments of skins.
Can it be League's (non-comedic) Mandela Effect universe?

Unrelated to my post, but will you ever expand upon the Scared Sword skin line, or at very least give them a little text bubble like you've done with a lot of other skins? It's one of my favorite skin lines, and as a Janna enthusiast, it's nice to see her with a skin that adds a bit more seriousness to her otherwise floaty character.
Pool Party and Academy in the same universe, yay or nay?

I look forwards to the many various versions of {{champion:21}} meeting each other, each with a individual quirk

Also the reveal that {{champion:245}} is part of a time-space singularity created by his abuse of the timewinder. Each version of him finally able to reunite and form his true self with the help of {{champion:26}}

or maybe not :-)

Unlikely
The champions of the old League universe were still representing their factions. I don't think people like Darius and Garen would put aside their differences and splash around in a pool together.

(Garen main)
I actaully don't care if it would mean teaming up with Darius as long as I got (forgot name:the thing that fiora has)

Well the whole point of the League in the old lore was that instead of war and actual fighting, they would settle everything on the Rift, which is why we had all the champions in one place. Literally in the old lore we had Kayle, hater of all things "unjust" sitting beside Karthus and Fiddlesticks.

I'm not sure why that would be the case.

As far as I'm aware the skins weren't necessarily canon back then and even if they were I don't see why these ones should be part of the old canon(where the league was for the most part serious business,some champs still wanted to kill each other outside  of the league)
